app.name: RDK2 Hello World
app.description:
This example is an introduction to the basic components of the board: LEDs, Buttons and KitProg3 UART for debug.

For more details, see the README on GitHub.

Rutronik Systems Solutions combine the best products based on their features and performance aiming at creating innovative and best-in-class solutions. Thus, we decisively shorten the time-to-market in dynamic industrial environments. Customers gain the necessary decision-making freedom in the research and pre-development phase and a time advantage over competitors.
app.req_capabilities: adc arduino bsp_gen4 can capsense capsense_linear_slider cat1 cat1a comp csd dma flash_512k hal i2c i2s led low_power lptimer mcu_gp memory memory_qspi multi_core nor_flash pdm pot psoc6 qspi rtc sdhc smart_io spi sram_256k std_crypto switch uart usb_device usb_host udb
